"Battledia: Yellow":
"Battledias are training facilities that you can access by using Battle Triggers at special terminals called \"Trigger Portals\".

To access each training menu, you need to bring a specific type of trigger to its matching terminal. For example, you can access Yellow Terminals with \"B. Trigger/Aelio Yellow\"."

"The triggers will be consumed when you clear the Quest. At this time, you will also receive all the EXP you earned from defeating enemies throughout the Battledia as one lump sum.

※During Battledia Quests, some boost effects will be nullified, and EXP earned from defeating low-level enemies will not be reduced."
